department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Acquisition of a suspended personnel platform
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of National Defence, is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the acquisition of one (1) suspended personnel platform suitable for use with up to three people as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
===============

**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**

**Title**: Suspended Personnel Platform (W355B-237053)

**Reference Number**: WS4223555314-Doc4223602404

**Publication Date**: November 3, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: December 8, 2023, at 2:00 PM (ET)

**Category**: Material Handling Machinery and Equipment (24100000)

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region**: Halifax

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**:

* Melanie Parent, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available

**Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17912791?extsite=MTc5MTI3OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17912791?extsite=MTc5MTI3OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Tender Description**:

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of National Defence, invites vendors to submit proposals for the acquisition of one (1) suspended personnel platform suitable for use with up to three people, as detailed in Annex A.

The platform shall be designed to accommodate the needs of the Department of National Defence, and all proposals submitted must meet the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

**Important Dates**:

* Tender Closing Date: December 8, 2023, at 2:00 PM (ET)
* Notice of Intent to Award: [TBD]

**Submission Instructions**:

All submissions must be made in electronic format through the [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com) platform.

For more information, please contact
